title: Amy’s House Search Drama + Eddie Organizes Search Party + Bret Michaels Shares 'Masked Singer' Experience
itunes:title: Amy’s House Search Drama + Eddie Organizes Search Party + Bret Michaels Shares 'Masked Singer' Experience
description:
Amy gives us an update on her house search, including some drama that went down at a recent showing. Eddie heard a woman scream in his neighborhood…and then went to help her. She said her daughter was missing so Eddie organized a search party. Plus, 'Poison' front man Bret Michaels talks to us about his new book, the story behind the hit “Every Rose Has Its Thorn” and why he chose to wear a banana costume on the Masked Singer!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
